project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Create a Python script that generates a secure random password based on user-defined criteria.

task.name: Implement the functionality to generate random characters (uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, special characters)
Implement a user interface to accept password length and specify character types to include
Write tests for the password generation to ensure randomization and compliance with criteria
Execute tests on the password generator feature to ensure accuracy and functionality
